price: зато се поуздај у Аллаха, јер ти, заиста, следиш праву истину!
arabic: فَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَى ٱلۡحَقِّ ٱلۡمُبِينِ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fatawakkal ʿalā al-lahi innaka ʿalā al-ḥaqi al-mubīni
